issue.title: [C++] Combine libarrow/libarrow_io/libarrow_ipc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-795](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-795). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From initial thirdparty users, it seems likely that users will link to all of these (or at least libarrow/libarrow_io) or none of them. It may be simpler for thirdparties for these core libraries to be a single link target instead of multiple.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-795?focusedCommentId=15961876) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~kou]` `[~xhochy]` do you have any concerns about this? I think this will make development a bit simpler

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-795?focusedCommentId=15962123) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
I have no concern because the change doesn't increase external dependencies of libarrow. I'll update c_glib for this change after this change is merged into master.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-795?focusedCommentId=15962841) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
